lines.text: The ICE... is gonna BREAK!
The missiles are flying. Hallelujah, Hallelujah!

"Bless me"? Do you know what God did for me? He threw an 18-wheeled truck at me and bounced me into nowhere for five years! When I woke up, my girl was gone, my job was gone, my legs are just about useless... Blessed me? God's been a real sport to me!
"As he was a bachelor, and in nobody's debt, nobody troubled their head about him anymore."
Is that what you feel?
Is what I want... what I want.
What about my question?
Huh? Huh? Oh, you mean the one about Hitler?
What would you do?
I don't like this, John. What are you getting at?
What would you do? Would you kill him?
All right. All right. I'll give you an answer. I'm a man of medicine. I'm expected to save lives and ease suffering. I love people. Therefore, I would have no choice but to kill the son of a bitch.
You'd never get away alive.
It doesn't matter. I would kill him.
[lifting drink]
Nasdro via. Skol.

[to Stillson]
It's over. You're finished.

[touching the mother of a serial killer]
You knew? Didn't you?
You... you're a devil, sent from Hell!
[first lines]

[Johnny is reading "The Raven" to his class]
And the Raven, never flitting, still is sitting, still is sitting, on the pallid bust of Pallas just above my chamber door, and his eyes have all the seeming of a demon's that is dreaming, and the lamp light o'er him streaming throws his shadow on the floor, and my soul from out that shadow that lies floating on the floor, shall be lifted... nevermore.
Put your hand on the scanning screen, and you'll go down in history with me!
As what? The world's greatest mass murderers?
You cowardly bastard! You're not the voice of the people, I am the voice of the people! The people speak through me, not you!
[Wanting Roger Stuart to be a part of his campaign]
I need your support, I need your expertise, I need your input, and most importantly, I need your money.
[laughter]
I have had a vision that I am going to be President of the United States someday. And nobody, and I mean *nobody* is going to stop me!

[John has "seen" Stillson become President and trigger WW3, and now is making up his mind how to prevent Stillson's holocaust]
If you could go back in time to Germany, before Hitler came to power, knowing what you know now, would you kill him?
Is that why you sent for me, to ask me this, uh... this question?
You're looking good.
Yeah, it's called the coma diet - lose weight while ya sleep
Your father says there's something wrong with you, he wants me to bring you out of your shell. I don't know what to do.
You don't have to do anything. It's my dad that lives in a shell, not me.
Your house is burning! There's still time!
[last lines]
Goodbye.
I love you.
I've been tutoring this boy named Stuart. In the vision, I saw him drown. But that's not the point. In the vision, something was missing.
How - how do you mean?
It was like... a blank spot, a dead zone.
First of all, tell me, did the boy, in fact, drown?
His father wanted him to play hockey. I talked him out of it. The boy's alive.
Ah. Yes. Don't you see how clear it is? Not only can you see the future, you can...
I can change it.
You can change it, exactly. Here. Yes, John. That is your... your "dead zone." The possibility of... of altering the outcome of your premonitions. It's fascinating. Let me make a note.
My God! What a glorious day!
Amen!
Let's send Greg Stillson to the United States Senate - and mediocrity to hell!
You put your god damn hand on that scanning screen, or I'll hack it off and put it on for you!
Complete the sequence, Mr. President.

[Answering the phone]
Hello? Who is it? Johnny?

[Stillson has just realized a photographer took photos of him using Denny, Sarah's child, as a human shield & realized what this will do to his career. He turns angrily to Sonny, his security detail chief]

[shouting]
Where's that kid with the camera? He was taking pictures!

[Disgusted]
I didn't see him!

[Furious]
You asshole!
